set(CGOGN_THIRDPARTY_BASE64_INCLUDE_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}" CACHE PATH "base64 include directory")

project(base64
	LANGUAGES CXX
	)

set(HEADER_FILES
	base64.h
	)

set(SOURCE_FILES
	base64.cpp
	)

add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} SHARED ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES})
set_target_properties(${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTIES DEBUG_POSTFIX "_d")
